name: .SBT File Extension
summary: Learn about .SBT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Subtitle file saved in the SBT format; contains subtitle text and timing information that defines when each subtitle should be displayed and for how long; typically saved along with a corresponding video file.

content: NOTE: Most subtitle files are saved in the .SUB, .SSA, or .SRT formats.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
